entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
